career_vision.career_stage: Student transitioning to professional IT consultant

long_term_goals: Advise organizations on scalable IT systems implementation
Drive technology strategy that improves measurable business performance
Build expertise in efficiency-driven technology solutions
Become a trusted advisor on digital transformation
Help companies align technology with business objectives
ideal_work_environment: Roles combining technical depth with business consulting
Teams that value analytical thinking and process improvement
Culture that rewards continuous learning and innovation
immediate_next_steps: Complete IT internship at FSU (current focus)
Develop deeper understanding of business operations
Network within consulting and IT advisory communities
Gain experience with enterprise systems and processes
